ygData.subject: Information hiding?
ygData.msgSnippet: From REST, 5.2.1: allows information hiding through a generic interface I took a stab at a precise definition of information hiding but struck out.  What

From REST, 5.2.1:

"allows information hiding through a generic interface"

I took a stab at a precise definition of "information hiding" but struck
out.  What information is hidden from whom?  Anyone?

-Eric
